item.description:
NOTE: Due to scheduling conflicts, we broke out of our usual routine and scheduled this on a Wednesday!

IT consultant, Phil Pawelcyzk of Core Support will review the latest operating system Leopard, discuss software, networking & backup issues and also offer tips for the home-office user.

Networking opportunities & cash bar at 6pm
The dinner is served by 7pm. Presenters usually begin while dessert is being served.

We need a LCD projector and a screen for this event. If anyone has one we can borrow, please contact Amanda Bedard: abedard@comcast.net as soon as possible.

TO RESERVE YOUR PLACE:
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab - Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email". - Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person) - Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent). - Put ICC meeting-Feb 27 in the "Subject" box. - Note: Use the
PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are:
- Chicken Picatta
- Salmon Teriyaki
- Veggie Stir-Fry

If you do not indicate a choice, you will be assigned a vegetarian entree. All meal choices include bread, salad, dessert & coffee or tea. Cash bar available. Don't forget to select "send money" to complete your order. Your completed PayPal transaction will confirm your reservation.

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Thursday, Feb 21. You must be paid in accordance with the instructions above before your reservation is considered accepted. Because we have to plan ahead, we need to collect money in advance. If you need to cancel, we will be able to refund your money only if you PHONE Laura Kolk at 860.646.0542 by the end of the day on Feb 21, so
that we can cancel your reservation.

We're looking forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Confetti's restuarant is a small venue. Ask for the "ICC" party.
item.why: Our mission is to share ideas in a relaxed casual forum. Network & make new friends in the group, treat yourself to a nice meal and enjoy the speaker's presentation.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford February Meetup
